With the requested Kiva loan, Irene will expand her business by purchasing more footwear and clothing. In the future, she wants to have her own stand to create even more employment in her community. This will enable her to look after her child financially.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing and footwear for her stock

loans.name: Sinanzeni

texts.en:
Sinanzeni is a 17-year-old entrepreneur who runs her own poultry business in Kwekwe District, Zimbabwe. She is a Camfed Learner Guide who volunteers at schools in her community teaching life skills education. Over the last six months, she has grown her poultry business from a mere 25 chickens that she received from her grandmother to its current capacity of producing over 80 broiler birds every six weeks. Sinanzeni sells the chickens to the local residents to support herself.  

Sinanzeni would very much like to increase her sales and raise enough funds to further her education. Therefore, she will use the Kiva loan to purchase more broiler chickens and chicken feed to increase production.

loans.use: To purchase more broiler chickens and chicken feed to increase production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's school expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicks for her poultry business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for an efficient cooking energy package using liquefied petroleum gas.

loans.name: Glenda Marisol

texts.es: Glenda tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 12 años y 5 años de edad. Glenda trabaja como vendedora de ropa en una tienda cercana a su localidad. Glenda es una mujer increíble quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para apoyar a su familia. Glenda desea solucionar el problema de las aguas grises que pasa por atrás de su vivienda lo cual le genera insalubridad e inseguridad para toda su familia. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una canaleta para sacar las aguas grises. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y grava. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Glenda is 34 years old and resides in her own home along with her two children (ages 12 and 5). She works as a clothing vendor at a shop near her town. Glenda is an incredible woman who takes full charge when it comes to supporting her family.

She wants to solve the problem of gray water that passes through at the back of her house, which is unhealthy and unsafe for her entire family. Glenda decided to request a loan from FUSAI so that she can build a gutter for redirecting the gray water. The amount she requested will be used to buy cement, sand, and gravel. She hopes to receive this loan so that she can proceed with construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy materials in order to construct a gutter for redirecting gray water.

loans.name: Gloria Argentina

texts.es: Doña Gloria es una mujer luchadora, dinámica y muy capaz quien es madre soltera de 2 hijos siendo uno de ellos el administrador de la propiedad y el encargado de dar el mantenimiento necesario para evitar que sus cultivos de café sean deteriorados, y el hijo menor quien estudia en cuarto grado en la escuela de la comunidad. Su grado de estudio es de secundaria completa quien es graduada como maestra de educación primaria y trabaja en la escuela de la comunidad con  plaza permanente. Su propiedad está conformada por 2 manzanas de tierra cultivadas con café lempira pues es bien sabido que es más resistente a las pagas y a la roya. Desde muy temprana edad ella aprendió a trabajar en la siembra y cultivo de café gracias a sus padres quienes son agricultores y como medio de ingreso económico para su familia han pasado de generación en generación los conocimientos. Su mercado es  local ya que tiene su propio cliente que es el encargado de comprar el grano. Sus metas y planes mejorar su calidad de vida mediante la ampliación de su tierra y diversificación del producto para evitar la concentración del mismo en un solo producto, apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios entre otros proyectos que conllevaran a mejorar la situación económica de su familia. Doña Gloria solicita pueda ser apoyada financiera mente por los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA para llevar a cabo la compra de los diferentes insumos que son utilizados para poder asistir y mantener sus cultivos de café sanos y con un excelente follaje como los abono, fertilizantes, foliares, etc.
texts.en:
Gloria is a hard-working, dynamic and very capable woman who is a single mother with two sons. One of them is the property manager and is responsible for doing the necessary maintenance so that the coffee crops do not deteriorate. The younger son is in fourth grade at the community primary school. Gloria has completed secondary education and graduated as a primary teacher. She has a permanent job in the community primary school.

Her property consists of 2 hectares of land planted with Lempira coffee, since it is well known that this is more resistant to pests and rust. She learnt how to plant and grow coffee from a very young age, thanks to her parents who are farmers. The knowledge has been passed down from generation to generation as a source of income for the family.

Gloria sells her coffee locally, as she has her own customer who is a coffee buyer. Her goals and plans are to improve her quality of life by extending her land and diversifying her crops to avoid concentrating on a single crop, and to support her sons in their education. She has other plans which will lead to an improvement in the family's financial situation.

Gloria is asking for financial help from the various lenders in the Kiva system so that she can buy the various supplies which are used to promote the coffee crops and keep them healthy, with excellent foliage. These supplies include manure, fertilizers and foliar feeds.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, foliar feeds and other items to look after her coffee crops.

loans.name: Jorge Iván

texts.es: El señor Jorge es un hombre de 32 años de edad que se desempeña como guarda de seguridad, trabajo que ha realizado en los últimos años para mantener su familia compuesta de una esposa y un hijo de 4 años de edad. Hace dos años se le ocurrió la idea de iniciar un negocio que básicamente es la distribución de productos de ferretería idea que le surgió pro necesidad ya que con su trabajo no alcanza a cubrir todos los gastos y necesidades que demanda su casa y núcleo familiar, actividad que inicio solo sin la ayuda de un familiar u amigo, solo su deseo y ganas de tener unos mejores ingresos lo llevaron a vender dichos productos. Trabajo solo sus productos lo distribuye entre familiares y amigos pues su poco capital no le da para ofrecer a más personas ya que no tendría con que comprar los materiales. Solicita una ayuda crediticia para comprar exclusivamente mercancía, con la que podrá ampliar su cartera de clientes, con la que podrá forjar un futuro para su esposa e hijo, con la que podrá con la ayuda de Dios salir de su empleo y dedicarse de lleno ah su negocio para ser su propio jefe, su propio ingeniero en la construcción de su futuro y no solo de el de su hijo y esposa que depende exclusivamente de Jorge
texts.en: Señor Jorge is a 32-year old man who works as a security guard.  He has done this work in recent years to support his family, which consists of his wife and his 4-year old son.  Two years ago, Jorge got the idea to start a business that basically is the distribution of hardware.  The idea came out of a need, as with what he was earning from his security job, he wasn't covering all of the household expenses or meeting the needs of his nuclear family.  He started the hardware business on his own without the help of any family members or friends.  Only his wishes and desire to have a better income brought Jorge to selling said products.  Jorge sells his products to family members and friends, as his small amount of capital isn't enough to sell to more people.  He doesn't have enough money to buy a supply of stock.  He is requesting financial assistance solely to purchase merchandise, with which he can expand his client portfolio.  With an expanded clientele, Jorge will be able to build a future for his wife and son and, G-d willing, leave his current position to dedicate himself fully to his business.  He would be able to be his own boss.  He would be his own engineer in the construction of his own future and his son's and wife's futures as well; they depend solely on Jorge.

loans.use: to purchase materials to be able to take on a greater number of customers.  He currently has a low volume of purchasers due to his lack of finances to purchase stock.

loans.name: Evertrine

texts.en:
Evetrine is a 26-year-old businesswoman. She is a single mother with one child, and lives in the Matobo District of Zimbabwe, where she successfully operates a small clothing shop. When she is not working in her shop, she is selling door-to-door and conducting counseling sessions with students at schools in her community where she volunteers as a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae organization. 

With the requested Kiva loan, Evetrine intends to make bulk purchases of men’s and women’s clothes so that she can increase her sales. 

With additional profits, Evetrine hopes to buy her own stand, build her own shop and expand her business, thus creating employment in her community.

loans.use: to make bulk purchases of clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, a generator, an iron, and to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and generator.

loans.name: Lệ

texts.en:
Mrs. Lệ works in agriculture, farming food. Lệ has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. 

Lệ is 44 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in the Quang Xuong district, a  rural area in the Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Lệ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Lệ has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Lệ faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet, a bathroom, and a water filter systerm .

With her business profit, Lệ hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet, a bathroom and a water filter system

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Mrs. Dung works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Dung is 46 years old and she is married with two children. She lives with two dependents in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in the Thanh Hoa province.

This is Dung's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Dung faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Dung hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Mrs. Minh works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Minh is 49 years old, and she is married with three children. Minh lives in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Minh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Minh has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Minh faces in her life is not having hygeinic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Minh hopes for her business to do well, to travel for vacation within the country, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Lý

texts.en:
Mrs. Lý has a retail business selling dry food; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  Lý is 34 years old, and she is married with two children. Lý lives with two dependents in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Lý faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a biogas system to install for cooking.

With her business profit, Lý hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase a biogas system to install for cooking.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer and the latest generation headphones.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
Evangelina es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora pues desde hace 24 años ha laborado diariamente para conseguir el sustento de su familia, en el momento en que separo de su esposo tomo el papel de cabeza de hogar para sostener a sus hijos.
Y aunque sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y trabajan, ella igual siente la responsabilidad de aportar en el hogar. Ella trabaja en su propia casa y tiene un pequeño taller de confecciona terceros que apenas está intentando levantar, este oficio lo aprendió al lado de su madre que siempre se desempeñó como confeccionista.
Pero ahora ella quiere tener su propia línea de ropa y vender sus propios productos, por esta razón necesita un apoyo económico para comprar algunos insumos que necesita como tela, botones, encajes, hilos, entre otros; y de esta manera cumplir con una de sus metas más importantes.
Su mayor sueño es tener un taller de confección y un almacén en el cual exhibir y vender sus prendas.
texts.en:
Evangelina is an enterprising and hardworking woman. She has worked every day for the past 24 years in order to provide for her family. At the moment, she is separated from her husband, so she took over as the head of her household in order to support her children.

Even though her children are now grown and working, Evangelina still feels the same level of responsibility in maintaining her household. She works at home and has a small sewing workshop that she is trying to set up in order to handle third-party orders. Evangelina learned the trade from her mother, who had always worked as a seamstress.

For now Evangelina wants to have her own line of clothing and sell her own products. For this reason, she needs financial assistance so that she can buy a few necessary supplies such as fabric, buttons, lace, thread, and other items. This would enable her to accomplish one of her most important goals.

Her dream is to have a sewing workshop and a store where she can display and sell her clothes.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, lace, thread, and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds and other items.

loans.name: Viện

texts.en:
Mrs. Viện works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Viện is 37 years old, and she is married with three children. Viện supports three dependents with her business in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Viện's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Viện faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Viện hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: 04 Yên Doãn 2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tâm is 54 years old and she is married with two children. Tâm is the group leader of the 04 Yên Doãn 2 solidarity group, which consists of five members. 

Tâm works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  

In 2011, Tâm joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tâm has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

She is requesting a loan to purchase baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

The main hardship that Tâm faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Tâm hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is 38 years old, married, and has three children. She lives in Galingon, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte. Lorena operates a sari-sari store to earn a living, which she has been doing for two years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP. 

Lorena requested a loan from PMPC, which she will use to purchase more basic needs items to sell. In the future, she hopes to expand her sari-sari store

loans.use: to purchase more basic needs items to sell

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.en:
Hermelinda is 60 years old and lives in Galingon, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with seven children.

To earn a living, Hermelinda has a business selling a variety of foods for snacks. She earns about 1,000 each month doing this type of small business. 

Hermelinda has a requested a loan for additional capital.

Hermelinda has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Hermelinda would like to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw foods to cook to sell.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is 52 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with two sons, one of whom is an adult, while the other is school age. 

For their source of living, Elvira has been working as a barangay auditor for six years, and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of work. She is also engaged in e-loading and a direct selling business.  

She has requested a loan to be used in paying the tuition fees and other school expenses of her youngest son. 

Elvira has been a member of PMPC for almost four years.  

In the future, Elvira hopes to expand her e-loading and direct selling business.

loans.use: to pay the tuition fees and other school expenses for her youngest son

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for plantain seed, fertilizer, and tools for a sustainable plantain project

loans.name: Miguel Andres

texts.es: Miguel tiene 42 años de edad y reside en habitación propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus 6 hijos, cuatro de los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Miguel tiene 6 años de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de pan. Tiene muchos clientes que cada día lo prefieren más. Miguel desea reparar el techo de la vivienda dado que se encuentra en malas condiciones y desea repararlo antes que el invierno se haga presente. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para proceder a la mejora del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Miguel is 42 years old and lives in his own home with his family which is made up of his wife and 6 children, four of which are studying. Miguel has worked making and selling bread for six years. He has many customers who prefer him more every day. Miguel wishes to repair the roof of his home because it is in poor condition. He would like to repair it before winter comes. For this he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to proceed with the roof improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof of the house.

loans.name: Djelika

texts.fr:
Née à OUALA, DJELIKA vit avec ses cinq enfants et son époux dans une  famille nucléaire à FILABOUGOU dans la commune rurale de OUELESSEBOUGOU Préfecture de KATI (Région de Koulikoro, République du MALI). 
DJELIKA n’a pas eu la chance de progresser à l’école, très vite elle s’intéressa aux activités génératrices de revenus à savoir l’achat vente d’habillements : tissus et pagne wax.    
DJELIKA est à son premier  prêt individuel avec Soro Yiriwaso qui sera utilisé pour acheter 20 pièces de pagnes. Elle s’approvisionne en pagnes à BAMAKO  et effectue ses ventes au comptant, à crédit et en détail, à domicile, dans le marché et dans les foires  environnants,  à une clientèle composés d’hommes et de femmes. 
DJELIKA  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 80.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour   aider son mari à subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir le reste dans les activités d’achat vente d’habillements.
texts.en:
Born in OUALA, DJELIKA lives with her five children and husband in a nuclear family in FILABOUGOU, in Commune Rurale de OUELESSEBOUGOU, Préfecture de KATI (Région de Koulikoro), Republic of Mali. Not having had the chance to progress in school, ROKIA soon became interested in revenue-generating businesses, namely, the buying and selling of cloth: fabrics and Wax ’pagnes’ (the colorful cloth of western Africa).

DJELIKA is on her first individual loan with Soro Yiriwaso. It will be used to purchase 20 lengths of ‘pagne’ cloth. She gets her supplies of it in Bamako. And she makes her sales retail to men and women customers paying with cash or credit at her home, at the market, and at surrounding fairs. 

DJELIKA hopes to make a monthly profit of 80,000 francs CFA that will be used to help out her husband in meeting family needs, pay back the loan, and reinvest the rest in the commerce of fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase cloth

loans.name: Majambere Group

texts.fr:
Léopold fait partie du groupe  Majambere et  habite à Bujumbura. Il est  marié à Pélouse, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 8 enfants âgés de 14 à 17 ans, dont 4 étudient.
Il adopte un enfant qui étudie.

Il fait le commerce de  poissons (ndagala) depuis  3 ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de poissons (ndagala) à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années prochaines, il voudrait  devenir  un importateur  et  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Léopold is part of the group Majambere and lives in Bujumbura. He is married to Pélouse, a merchant. Together they have eight children, from 14 to 17 years old, of whom four are students. He is adopting a child, who is in school. 

Léopold has been doing commerce in fish (ndagala) for three years. 

This is his first Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase a large quantity of fish (ndagala) to resell, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, he would like to  become an importer and see his children educated.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of fish (ndagala) to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Hiền

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiền works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is 32 years old and married with two children. Hiền lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Hiền’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Hiền has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

The main hardship that she faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. With her business profits, Hiền hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her children, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a  toilet.

loans.name: Buvemwo Group

texts.fr:
Nicodème fait partie du groupe  Buvemwo et  habite à Bubanza. Il est  marié à Espérance, une commerçante.

Elle fait le commerce de  charbon de bois  depuis  7 ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’arbres pour préparer une grande quantité de charbon de bois à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années prochaines, il voudrait construire une maison et pratiquer de l’agriculture et  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Nicodème is part of the group Buvemwo and lives in Bubanza. He is married to Espérance, a merchant. 

Nicodème has been doing commerce in charcoal for seven years. 

This is his first Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase many trees in order to make a lot of charcoal to resell, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, he would like to build a house, to work in farming, and see his children educated.

loans.use: to purchase many trees make a large amount of charcoal to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Lợi

texts.en:
Lợi works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.  She is 33 years old and married with two children. Lợi lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Lợi’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Lợi has been involved in this business for seven years.

The main hardship that Lợi faces in her life is not having hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. With her business profits, Lợi hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a  toilet.

loans.name: Sitapha

texts.fr:
Né à DIANGUERELA, SITAPHA vit avec ses cinq enfants et son époux  dans une  famille nucléaire au quartier  BANANKABOUGOU,   de la ville de  OUELESSEBOUGOU, Préfecture de KATI (Région de Koulikoro, République du MALI). 
SITAPHA n’a pas eu la chance de progresser à l’école, très vite il s’intéressa aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment l’achat vente des marchandises de boutique : thé, sucre, cigarette, riz, mil, maïs, huile, savon, cahier, bic et boisson.     SITAPHA est à son premier  prêt individuel avec Soro Yiriwaso qui sera utilisé pour acheter,  3 sacs de sucre,  4 cartons de savon, 3 sacs de riz, 20 cartons de thé et 10 cartouches de cigarettes. Il  s’approvisionne auprès des  grossistes à BAMAKO  et effectue ses ventes au comptant, à crédit et en détail, à BANANKABOUGOU à une clientèle mixte. 
SITAPHA espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 50.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour rembourser le prêt et réinvestir le reste dans les activités d’achat vente des marchandises de boutique.
texts.en:
Born in DIANGUERELA, SITAPHA lives with his five children and wife in a nuclear family in the BANANKABOUGOU district of OUELESSEBOUGOU CITY, Préfecture de KATI (Région de Koulikoro), Republic of MALI. Not having had the chance to progress in school, SITAPHA soon became interested in revenue-generating businesses, especially in the buying and selling of shop goods:  tea, sugar, cigarettes, rice, millet, corn, oil, soap, notebooks, bic [ballpoint pens], and beverages. 

SITAPHA is on his first individual loan with the the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. It will used to purchase 3 sacks of sugar, 4 boxes of soap, 3 sacks of rice, 20 boxes of tea, and 10 cartons of cigarettes. He gets his supplies from wholesalers in Bamako. And he makes his sale retail to a mixed customer base paying with cash or credit, in BANANKABOUGOU. 

SITAPHA hopes to make a monthly profit of 50,000 francs CFA that will be used to pay back the loan and to reinvest the rest in the commerce of groceries.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of grocery items for his shop

loans.name: Reseau Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    RESEAU est constitué de quatre femmes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 31 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  NIEBALA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 1er prêt. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  boissons sucrées à l’image de ALIMA qui est la 1ère femme debout  dans la photo de la droite vers la gauche. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, cinquante  kilo de sucre, trente kilo de gingembre  et des essences bananes avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The group RESEAU is composed of four married women, who average 31 years of age and four children each. The women live in traditional extended families in the NIEBALA district of Bougouni City. And they know one another through ties of community, friendship, and commerce. 

To bolster their financial capacity, so as to have better businesses, they joined the the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first loan with it. 

This group of women does commerce in soft drinks, as does ALIMA, who is the first woman standing from the right in the photo. She intends to use her loan to purchase 50 kg of sugar, 30 kg ginger, and some banana flavoring from wholesalers in Bougouni. She makes her sales retail to a mixed customer base paying with cash or credit at her home and at the market. 

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 15,000 francs CFA that will be invested in her business  and used to pay back the loan.

loans.use: to purchase the ingredients for making soft drinks.

loans.name: 03 Yên Doãn 2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tuân has a service business providing Internet café services. She is requesting a loan to purchase electrical and internet devices for internet service. Tuân is 31 years old and married with two children. Tuân is the group leader of the 03 Yên Doãn2 Solidarity Group, which consists of six members. 

In 2012, Tuân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tuân has been involved in this business for three years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her, is the lack of capital. With her business profits, Tuân hopes to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, for her children to do well in school, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase electrical and internet devices for internet service.

loans.name: Hoàn

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoàn works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is 39 years old and married with four children. Hoàn lives with four dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Hoàn’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for seven years.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. With her business profits, Hoàn hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a  toilet.

loans.name: Sabali Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    SABALI est constitué de  6 femmes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  FARABA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur sixième (6ème) prêt. Les 5 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  condiments à l’image de AWA qui est la 1ère femme debout  dans la photo de la gauche vers la droite. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, cinq  cartons de patte de tomate, deux cent cinquante  kilos de sel iodé, trois  sacs d’oignons avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 45.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The group SABALI is composed of six married women, who average 39 years of age and five children each. The women live in traditional extended families in the FARABA district of Bougouni City. And they know one another through ties of community, friendship, and commerce. 

To bolster their financial capacity, so as to have better businesses, they joined the the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their sixth loan with it. 

This group of women does commerce in condiments, as does AWA, who is the first woman standing from the left in the photo. She intends to use her loan to purchase 5 boxes of tomato paste, 250 kg of iodized salt, and 3 sacks of onions from wholesalers in Bougouni. She makes her sales retail to a mixed customer base paying with cash or credit at her home and at the market. 

AWA envisions making an average monthly profit of 45,000 francs CFA that will be invested in her business  and used to pay back the loan.

loans.use: to purchase condiments, such as salt, tomato paste, and onions.

loans.name: Xuân

texts.en:
Mrs. Xuân works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is 43 years old and married with three children.  Xuân lives with three dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Xuân’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for six years.

The main hardship that Xuân faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. With her business profits, Xuân hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Santa Rita De Casia Group

texts.es:
La socia María pertenece al banco comunal SANTA RITA DE CASIA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia María tiene 45 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 05 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesania,la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio ,la socia a la vez elabora bisutería como aretes,collares,anillos entre otros para los distintos clientes que le solictan,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales como alambres, hilos entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios también se dedican trabajador de empresa estatal y artesanía.
texts.en:
María belongs to the Santa Rita de Casia communal bank, which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. She is 45 years old and is widowed with five children. María alternates her daily activities between her artisan business which she has had for years thanks to the hard work that she invests each day, and the production of jewelry including earrings, necklaces, rings and other items that that her customers request. María is responsable and persevering, as this has been the way she can get her family ahead. 

María is requesting this loan to buy materials including wires and thread. She is grateful for the loan offered and is committed to fulfilling the established payment schedule. The rest of the members work either in artisan crafts or in state-run businesses.

loans.use: to buy materials including wires and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and affordable clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es: Francisco José es un hombre muy trabajador y dedicado a su familia, habita en la zona rural en el Barrio 30 de mayo. Junto a su esposa que es ama de casa procrearon tres hijos que desde hace poco tiempo son personas independientes y con deseos de superación igual que sus padres. Francisco labora desde hace más de diez años para el estado de Nicaragua como vigilante de la Alcaldía de su municipio, dicho trabajo le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda las cuales no son las optimas para habitarla, ya que inicialmente es necesario cambiar las paredes de zinc que actualmente posee por paredes de concreto, por lo cual necesita invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción tales como: piedras canteras, cemento, hierro, arena, piedrín y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en: Francisco José is a very hard working man who is dedicated to his family. He lives in a rural area in the 30 de mayo neighborhood. With his wife, who is a homemaker, they have three children who have just recently become independent, with the same desire to get ahead as their parents. Francisco has worked for more than ten years for the Nicaraguan government as a security guard for his municipality's mayoral office. This work will enable him to improve his housng conditions, as his home is not optimal to live in. Firstly, it is necessary to replace the walls made of metal sheeting that he currently has with concrete walls. For this project he needs to invest in the purchase of building materials including quarry stones, cement, iron, sand, and gravel, and to pay for the labor.

loans.use: to buy building materials including quarry stones, cement, iron, sand, and gravel, and to pay for the labor.

loans.name: Mercedes De Jesus

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 60 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Mercedes es una mujer increíble quien a pesar de su edad no se cansa de trabajar y luchar por mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su hogar de habitación. Tiene 20 años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que la prefieren por los buenos productos que ofrece. Mercedes desea construir un corredor en su vivienda ya que actualmente esta hecho de plástico lo cual no es seguro en tiempos de lluvias. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para proceder a la construcción del corredor  lo antes posible.
texts.en: Mercedes is 60 years old and lives in her own home with her children. She is an incredible woman who, despite her age, doesn't get tired of working and fighting for better living conditions. She makes a living selling tortillas from her home. She has carried out this activity for twenty years, and now has many customers who choose her because of the high quality products that she offers. Mercedes hopes to build an entryway to her home because it is currently made of plastic, which is not safe during the rainy season. For this reason she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails to proceed with the construction of this entryway as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails to build an entryway to her home.

loans.name: 08 Minh Thanh Minh Lộc Group

texts.en: Vinh is applying for a loan to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in future. She works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Vinh is 56 years old and married with one child. Vinh is the group leader of the 08 Minh Thanh, Minh Lộc Solidarity Group, which consists of three members.  This is Vinh’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for four years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. In the future, Vinh hopes for her business to do well, to maintain a successful business, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: 08-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Nhàn is 51 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province. She is the group leader of the 08-Nam Ngan Group, which consists of three members. 

Nhàn has a retail business selling clothes, which she has been doing for over 10 years. The main hardship she faces is the lack of capital. She is requesting her third loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women, which she will use to purchase clothes to sell. With her business profit, Nhàn hopes her children find good jobs, her family is healthy and happy, and her business does well.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Lai

texts.en:
Lai, who has been working in agriculture farming poultry and cattle for two years, is a 26-year-old married mother of two. She supports two dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Lai's main hardship is not having a hygienic latrine. She is therefore requesting her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

Lai hopes to maintain and develop her business so as to earn enough to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Quân

texts.en:
Mr. Quân works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. He is 26 years old and married with one child. Quân lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Quân’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. He has been involved in this business for two years.

The main hardship that Quân faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. With his business profits, Quân hopes to buy land of his own, to make enough money to provide for his children, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hòe

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoè works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Hoè is 26 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hoè first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hoè hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Vân

texts.en:
Mrs. Vân works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Vân is 39 years old, and she is married with three children. She supports three dependents with her business in the Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Vân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Vân faces in her life is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

In the future, Vân hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: John Michael

texts.es: John es un joven emprendedor que sabe perfectamente el concepto de luchar por sus sueños, pues hace un año tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, que le manda su tía en el exterior, lo cual ha tenido muy buen acogimiento por parte de sus clientes que básicamente son sus compañeros de clase, esta actividad básicamente la realiza para el manteamiento de sus gastos universitarios pues tiene muy claro que el estudio es la mejor salida a la pobreza y que la única manera de mejorar su situación y aportar algo pro su país es ser una persona de bien estudiosa con un futuro prometedor, a medida que avanzada con su proyecto de ventas surgieron más necesidades dado que su familia requería que John aportara para los gastos de su hogar y gracias a esta venta de ropa ha podido ayudar en su hogar y mantener sus estudios universitarios, hoy en día solicita una ayuda crediticia para comprar mercancía, para seguir forjando ese futuro para ir paso a paso a un mejor futuro a tratar de alcanzar su sueño el cual es montar un almacén de ropa, el cual pueda generar un empleo para algún familiar y que John pueda atender su negocio pero principalmente dedicarse de lleno a su estudios.
texts.en: John is an enterprising young man who is well-acquainted with the concept of fighting for your dreams.  One year ago, he started a clothing sales business.  His aunt sends him clothing from abroad.  He has been very well-received by his customers, who are basically his classmates.  John runs this business primarily to help with his university expenses.  It is very clear to him that education is the best way to get out of poverty and the only way to improve his situation and contribute something to his country.  John is a very studious person with a promising future.  As his sales project advanced, more needs came up; John's family needed him to contribute to the household expenses.  Thanks to his clothing sales, he has been able to help his household and keep up with his studies at the university.  John is now requesting financial help to purchase merchandise, to continue building a future.  He plans to go step by step toward a better future, to try to reach his dream, which is to open a clothing store.  The store could generate employment for a family member and John could take care of his store but primarily dedicate himself fully to his studies.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise so he can have a greater variety of styles and products to offer to his customers.

loans.name: Jhon Fredy

texts.es:
Jhon es un hombre carismático y trabajador, tiene 40 años y es padre de 3 hijos pequeños, vive con su esposa en una vivienda arrendada.
El trabajo en distintas empresas desempeñándose en cargos menores por su carencia de estudios técnicos, pero eso no lo detuvo a buscar la oportunidad de ser independiente, pues desde hace 12 años se quedó sin empleo y decidió iniciar con su propio negocio.
Su actividad es la preparación y venta de tinto y café en el centro de Medellín, Colombia, actividad que realizan muchas personas en el municipio. Este oficio lo aprendió al lado de un señor que muy amablemente  le enseñó y lo aconsejó acerca del negocio.
En estos momentos trabaja independiente y en su propio horario; él solicita un crédito para comprar más termos en los cuales transportar sus bebidas y requiere de algunos insumos como vasos desechables y mezcladores.
Su principal objetivo es poder conseguir otro carro para transportar los tintos y de esta manera generar otro empleo.
El motor de su vida y lo que lo motiva a superarse cada día es poder darles un sustento digno a sus hijos y su esposa quien ha sido su apoyo más grande en este negocio.
texts.en:
Jhon is a charismatic and hardworking man.  He is 40 years old and the father of three young children.  He lives with his wife in a rented home and has worked for different companies, doing small jobs because of his lack of technical education, but that did not stop him from searching for the opportunity to become independent.  12 years ago he found himself to be unemployed and decided to start his own business.

He prepares and sells coffee in the Medellin, Colombia city center.  This is something that many people do.  He learned this skill from another gentleman who taught him and advised him on this business.

He now works on his own and makes his own schedule.  He is asking for this loan to buy more vacuum bottles with which to transport his beverages and he also needs some supplies such as disposable cups and mixers.  

His main goal is to be able to buy another car to transport his coffee and create another job.

He is motivated by wanting to support his wife and children who have been his greatest support in this business.

loans.use: to buy vacume bottles.

loans.name: Sharofidin

texts.ru:
Шарофидин является 42-летним певцом из района Кубадиён. Вот уже 10 лет как он успешно осуществляет свою музыкальную деятельность. Он не только умеет красиво петь, но и играть на музыкальных инструментах. Эта профессия передается в их семье из поколения к поколению. Шарофидин рад, что продолжает ремесло своих предков.
Шарофидин женатый человек, имеет детей. Он со своей семьей проживает в районе Кубадиён. Шарофидин и его группа ансамбли предлагают свои услуги жителям района по случаю проведения свадебных и других торжественных мероприятий. Их услуга всегда востребована. Шарофидин хочет расширить свою деятельность. Он берет кредит, чтобы приобрести новые музыкальные инструменты, которые ему очень необходимы. Он полагается на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Sharofidin is a 42-year-old singer from the Qubadiyon region. He has had a successful career in music for ten years. Not only does he sing beautifully, he also plays musical instruments. The musical profession is a family tradition that is passed from generation to generation, and Sharofidin is happy to continue the art of his ancestors. 

Sharofidin is a married man and has children. He and his family live in the Qubadiyon region where Sharofidin is part of an ensemble group that performs at weddings and other special occasions in the area. The group is always in demand. Sharofidin wants to expand his activities and has taken out a loan to purchase new musical instruments, which he really needs. He relies on the financial support.

loans.use: to buy new musical instruments

loans.name: Blanca Idalia

texts.es: Blanca tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Blanca es una mujer luchadora quien trabaja muy duro para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Blanca trabaja como empleada en una institución cercana a su localidad y de esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar. Blanca desea mejorar las condiciones del techo de uno de los cuartos dormitorios de su vivienda dado que la lámina se encuentra picada por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para reparar el techo del cuarto lo antes posible.
texts.en: Blanca is 29 years old. She lives in her own house along with her partner and their children. Blanca is a tough woman who works very hard to provide her family with better living conditions. Blanca works as an employee for an institution near her house. That work is how she earns her living, and along withher partner, they maintain their household economy. Blanca wants to improve the condition of her home's roof, since it has little holes in it. That's why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will use the money to purchase corrugated steel, wood, and nails so that she can repair her roof as quickly as possible.

loans.use: buy the supplies she needs to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: El señor  Julio tiene 52 años, casado tiene cuatro hijos, él se dedica al tapizado de sillas asientos de movilidades como flotas buses, etc., tiene su taller en la carretera camino a la localidad de Viacha,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el señor  Julio va a usar este préstamo para compra de una máquina industrial, como también material como cuero para realizar su trabajo,   su razón para solicitar es que tiene muchos pedidos para esta época,  el señor  Julio enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar la calidad de su trabajo,  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando tela y cuero para la realización de su trabajo, el señor  Julio es una persona con ganas de seguir adelante se siente feliz por esta oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Julio is 52 years old and is married with four children. He makes a living doing tapestry work for chairs and seats for vehicles including buses and fleets. H has his workshop located on the highway toward the neighborhood oof Viacha. This loan is his second with the organization. Julio will use this loan to buy a industrial sewing machine, as well as material such as leather to carry out his work. 

His reason for requesting the loan is that he has many orders at this time of year. Julio faces challenges in his business and hopes to improve the quality of his work. He is going to use his profits to continue buying fabric and leather to carry out his work. Julio is a person with a great desire to get ahead. He is pleased with this opportunity that he is being offered so that he can improve his business and as a result, his income.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine to carry out his work.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.es: El señor Jacinto  tiene 64 años tiene tres hijos ya mayores de edad e independientes, el es electricista automotriz se dedica al arreglo de movilidades,   vive en la zona de  Pampahasi donde es su taller, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución va a usar este préstamo para la mejora de su negocio comprando algunos materiales que necesita,   su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que tiene mucho trabajo que hacer,  y va a utilizar los beneficios siempre en el crecimiento del negocio su deseo  para  su negocio es tener mayores ingresos y apoyar a la familia  económicamente y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jacinto, 64 years old, has three grown, independent children. He is an automotive electrician who works at repairing vehicles. He lives in the Pampahasi area, where he has his shop. This is his first loan within the institution, and he plans to use it to improve his workshop by buying some materials he needs. His reason for obtaining the loan is that he has a lot of work to do, and he will take advantage of any benefit he can get to grow his business. His goal is to expand his work, earn more income, and be able to economically support his family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: improve his automotive shop.

loans.name: El Diamante Group

texts.es: El grupo está integrado por tres mujeres exitosas en su trabajo, coordinado por la señora Mercedes de 24 años de edad, casada y madre de tres hijos de las edades de 5 y 3 años y un bebé de dos meses,posee una panadería en su domicilio y distribuye el pan en el mercado local y capitalino, cuenta con la ayudad de su esposo para la elaboración del producto y el crédito lo requiere para la compra de el quintal de harina, margarina, levadura, huevos, azúcar, aceite y más, con el crédito anterior la socia invirtió en estos productos y obtuvo mayores ganancias logrando la compra sartenes para aumentar la producción. Otra de las socias es la señora Dalila de 38 años de edad propietaria de una repostería y distribuye sus productos en la capital, y la señora Claudina de 54 años dedicada a la venta de tortillas y frijoles cosidos en su domicilio. Estas socias son un claro  ejemplo de superación personal.
texts.en: This communal bank is made up of three women who have been successful in their work.  It is coordinated by señora Mercedes, who is 24-years old, married and the mother of three children, who are 5 and 3-years old, and the baby is two-months old.  She has a bakery that she runs out of her home.  She sells her bread in the local market and in the market in the capital.  Her husband helps her make her products.  She needs the loan to purchase a hundredweight of flour, margarine, yeast, eggs, sugar, cooking oil and other items.  With the previous loan, Mercedes invested in these products, earned a better profit and was even able to purchase frying pans with which to increase her production.  Another member of the communal bank is señora Dalila, who is 38-years old and is the owner of a pastry shop.  She sells her products in the capital.  Señora Claudina is 54-years old and makes her living selling tortillas and cooked beans from her home.  These members are a clear example of personal improvement.

loans.use: with the purchase of a hundredweight of flour, margarine, yeast, eggs, sugar, cooking oil and other items.

loans.name: William Evelio

texts.es: El señor William es un hombre trabajador de 60 años de edad, casado y padre de dos hijos de las edades de 22 y 13 años, se dedicado al mantenimiento de piscinas a domicilio, el socio requiere el crédito para la compra de químicos como es el PVC, hule, polliuretane, etc.
texts.en: Señor William is a 60-year old, hard-working man.  He is married and the father of two children, who are 22- and 13-years old respectively.  He makes his living maintaining residential pools.  He needs a loan to purchase chemicals such as PVC, oilcloth, polyurethane etc.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals like glue, PVC, oilcloth, polyurethane etc.

loans.name: Hồng

texts.en:
Mrs. Hồng works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle; she has been involved in this business for five years. Hồng is 26 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives and works in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

This is Hồng's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hồng faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hồng hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Pedro Tomás

texts.es: El señor Pedro de 69 años de edad y casado se dedica a la venta de lubricantes en su domicilio, el socio ha obtenido créditos en ocasiones anteriores y ha logrado mayores ganancias y por ende mejoras en su vida, por tal razón solicita el crédito para la compra de un barril de lubricantes, y luego él lo vende por litro, con la compra de este producto sus ganancias aumentarán, mejorando su nivel de vida
texts.en: Pedro is 69 year old and married.  He works selling lubricants from his home.  He has received loans on previous occasions and has been able to increase his earnings and in so doing, improve his life.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan to purchase a barrel of lubricants.  He will later sell the lubricant by liter.  He will be able to increase his earnings by purchasing this product, and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: Purchase a barrel of lubricant.

loans.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mai has a retail business selling dry food; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 46 years old, and she is married with four children. Mai lives in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Mai joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Mai has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Mai hopes for her business to do well, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mrs. Mai has a retail business selling medication; she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Mai is 49 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives with two dependents in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Mai joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Mai has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Mai hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la compra y venta de animales de corral cuyes, patos y pavos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Raúl is 44 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Oyotun, a community devoted to agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is located in the Province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Raul buys and sells barnyard animals such as guinea pigs, ducks, and turkeys which he keeps behind his house. He is asking for a loan of 1,000 new sols so he can buy feed to fatten his animals and thus generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy feed for fattening his animals.

loans.name: Nghĩa

texts.en:
Mr. Nghĩa operates a food stall restaurant selling fish. He is 25 years old and married with one child. He lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents. This is Nghĩa’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. He has been involved in this business for three years. 

The main hardship that Nghĩa faces in his life is not having a latrine so his family shares a neighbor’s latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. With his business profits, Nghĩa hopes for his business to do well, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for his business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Phượng

texts.en:
Phượng has a retail business selling dried foods. She is 51 years old and married with two children. Phượng lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. In 2013, she joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Phượng has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

The main hardship that Phượng faces in her life is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.  In the future, Phượng hopes to buy a cell phone, to travel for vacation internationally, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Mirna Claribel

texts.es: Mirna tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 6 años de edad. Mirna se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora dado que desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la comercialización de pupusas, frutas y refrescos. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar.  Mirna solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos dado que desea cambiar techo de un cuarto dormitorio el cual se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en:
Mirna is 24 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their young daughter, who is 6 years old. Mirna describes herself as an entrepreneurial woman, since she has worked by selling pupusas, fruit, and beverages for a long time. This is how she makes a living and supports her household with her husband.

Mirna requests this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized laminate, wood, and nails, since she would like to change the roof of a bedroom that is deteriorating.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized laminate, wood, and nails to repair the roof of a bedroom.

loans.name: Mario Ezequiel

texts.es:
Mario de 57 años de edad, casado con hijos mayores de edad, es originario del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región, se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio en la necesidad de trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad sigue luchando para sobrevivir  y tener unos ingresos económicos fijos.

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de granos basicos como: arroz, frijoles, azucar, aceite, jabon, cereales. Le dedica a su negocio  unas diez horas diarias ofreciendo su producto, actividad que la desempeñay en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Mario agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Mario is 57 years old, married, and has adult children. He is originally from El Sauce, which is located in the northern zone of the region. He is hardworking, responsible, and wants to improve himself. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources, he was not able to study for a degree and found it necessary to work from a young age to help with household expenses. He is currently fighting to survive and has some permanent sources of income.

Thanks to his efforts and his desire to move forward, he sells basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, oil, soap, and cereal. He dedicates 10 hours per day to selling products at his business, which is located in his home.

The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock his business so that in the not so distant future, he can earn more income. Mario thanks the Kiva lenders who support people with limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so that they can have a respectable job.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and purchase basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, oil, soap, and cereal.

loans.name: Delmi Elena

texts.es: Delmi tiene 29 años de edad y habita ne casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño  hijo de 2 años de edad. Delmi se dedica a la confección de uniformes escolares y este negocio es el que le permite complementar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos del hogar. Delmi solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un corredor en su vivienda para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos. Espera poder tener accesos a este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción del corredor lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Delmi is 29 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their young child, who is 2 years old.

Delmi earns her living making school uniforms, and this business is what allows her to supplement the necessary income to cover household expenses.

Delmi is asking FUSAI for this loan because she wants to build a corridor in her house, for which she needs to buy materials, like galvanized steel, wood and nails. 

She hopes to be able to have access to this financing and begin the construction of the corridor as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel, wood and nails to build a corridor in her house.

loans.name: Thủy

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuỷ works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is 39 years old and she is married, with three children. Thuỷ lives with four dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thuỷ's first loan with the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Thuỷ has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Thuỷ faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Thuỷ hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, to maintain a successful business, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Los Laureles  (Nabón) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Los Laureles está formado por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por el cantón de Nabón de la provincia del Azuay, una de sus características geográficas es la dispersión de su territorio, lo que impide un fácil acceso a las diferentes comunidades y dificulta la comunicación entre ellas, la actividad principal de sus habitantes es la agricultura, crianza de animales y muchos salen diariamente a la ciudad a laborar en diferentes actividades, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María, este es su sexto crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas con quienes comparte gratos momentos y le ayudan a salir adelante con sus consejos y apoyo, los créditos le ayudan a mejorar su negocio y la estabilidad en su hogar.
La Señora María tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos, dos de sus hijos ayudan en los quehaceres de su casa, dos están estudiando en el colegio y tres están en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo labora como albañil y la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña María como vive en el campo se dedica a la cría de ganado, cuyes, pollos y borregos, también a la agricultura, lo que cosecha lo vende o es para el consumo de su casa. El dinero de su crédito es para la compra de pollos, cuyes y  alimento para animales. Su meta es tener más animales de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
The "Los Laureles" lending group is made up of eight members (7 female, 1 male) who live in the Nabón canton in the Azuay province.  One of the area's geographic characteristics is the scattered territory, which impedes easy access to the different communities, and makes communication between them difficult.  The main economic activities of the residents are agriculture and raising animals.  Many also go to the city to work in different activities.  They still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

One of the members of this group is María.  This is the sixth loan that she has obtained alongside her friends with whom she shares great moments.  They help her to get ahead with their advise and support.  The loans help her to improve her business and the stability of her home.  María is 44 years old, married and has conceived 7 children.  Two of her children help with the household work, two are in high school, and three are in the local primary school.  Her husband works as a mason, and they own the home that they live in.  Since she lives in the country, María devotes herself to raising cattle, guinea pigs, chickens, and sheep, as well as agriculture.  She sells what she harvests or she uses it at home.

The money from the loan will be used to purchase chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.  Her goal is to have more high quality animals.

loans.use: purchase chickens, guinea pigs and feed for animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for an affordable and reliable clean cooking energy package that uses liquefied petroleum gas.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar Augusto tiene 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público, trasladando a sus pasajeros a zonas aledañas a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 300 nuevos soles para el trámite de su licencia para conducir y una segunda parte para la compra de unos repuestos para su vehículo y de esta manera seguir generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar Augusto is 34 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the district of Cayalti, a community dedicated to agriculture, business, and livestock-raising, located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

He offers public transportation services, carrying his passengers to the surrounding zones of his district. He has applied for a loan of 2300 PEN to do the paperwork for his driver's license, and a second [part of the loan is] for purchasing some spare parts for his vehicle, so that in this way he can continue generating better income for his family.

loans.use: to do the paperwork for his driver's license and to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Damian

texts.es:
Damián tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cañarís, una comunidad tranquila, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Ferreñafe, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de cafeto de la variedad catimor, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Damian is 41 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the district of Cañaris, a peaceful community whose population works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock-raising, located in the Ferreñafe province, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

He works in agriculture, especially in growing coffee of the Catimor variety. He has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2500 PEN to buy compost to maintain his coffee plantings and in this way to have a timely production to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy compost to maintain his coffee planting

loans.name: Roxana Maribel

texts.es: Roxana tiene 30 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 6 años y  2 años  de edad. Roxana  se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Roxana desea construir el corredor de su humilde vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos dado que no posee los recursos económicos para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Roxana is 30 years old. She, her partner, and their children, ages 6 and 2, live in their own home together. Roxana earns her living by providing domestic services, and together she and her spouse maintain the household economy. Roxana wants to build a hallway for their humble home, which is why she is turning to FUSAI for this loan. She will invest the money in buying corrugated steel, wood, and nails as the family does not have the economic resources to pay for such expenses out of pocket. However, they are able to pay for the work by making the monthly payments entailed by the loan.

loans.use: buy the supplies she needs to add a hallway in her house.

loans.name: Osmar Daniel

texts.es:
Osmar de 47 años de edad, soltero con un hijo menor de edad, es originario del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región. Se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal, en sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de su familia. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligado a trabajar desde temprana edad. En la actualidad lucha día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracias  a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica una pulpería, es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, detergente, jabón, fósforos, jugos, gaseosas. El dedica a su negocio unas doce horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Osmar agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a  personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Osmar is 47 years old, single and has a young son.  He is a native of Sauce, a place located in the northern zone of the region.  He is known for being hardworking, responsible, and having a desire for self improvement. In his free time, he likes to be with his family.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources, he was not able to complete his education, and he was forced to start working from a young age.  Currently, he fights everyday to provide his children with a better future.  Thanks to his effort and his desire to get ahead, he now has a grocery store.  It is a small store that sells food in small quantities such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, soap, matches, juices, and sodas.  He works about 12 hours a day in his business.  

The goal of this loan is to invest in working capital and stock his grocery store so that in the near future, he will be able to increase his earnings.  Osmar is grateful for the help that the Kiva lenders provide to people of few means in poor countries like Nicaragua, so that they may have a dignified source of work.

loans.use: stock his grocery store with rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, soap, matches, juices, and sodas.

loans.name: Alma Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Alma es una mujer exitosa de 60 años de edad, soltera y madre de dos hijos, se dedica a la compra-venta de muebles y artesanías por encargo en un barrio de la capital, la socia solicita el crédito para la compra de sillas mesedoras, roperos, jugueteras, etc, la socia con créditos anteriores ha logrados mejoras en el tramo donde comercializa, por lo que afirma haber logrado  mejoras su en su vida personal y laboral.
texts.en: Mrs. Alma is a successful woman of 60 years of age. She is single and the mother of two children. Her primary work is buying and selling furniture and artisanal crafts on order. She works out of a neighborhood near the capital. She is requesting a loan so that she can purchase rocking chairs, wardrobes, toy boxes and more. With previous loans, Alma has improved the space where she sells, which she says has improved both her personal and her professional life.

loans.use: buy rocking chairs, wardrobes, and toy boxes for resale.
